frontmatter.title: Components

frontmatter.description: Hero markup component for pages introductions or banners.

frontmatter.description: Everything you need to stylize svg icons.

frontmatter.description: Default link styles for html links, can also be applied to buttons and other tags.

frontmatter.title: List
frontmatter.description: Flex component to space any element with margins, also spaces vertically.

frontmatter.description: List subcomponent to group up buttons, inputs and other content.

frontmatter.description: Listing markup component for category pages or simple product listing.

frontmatter.title: Loader
frontmatter.description: Plug and play visual loaders, can easily integrate with javascript.
